History

Your Business Growth Is Our Aim

Techabled Consulting, founded in 2021, is a customer-centric Salesforce Consulting Partner. With expertise across all main industries and business functions, we build and deliver cloud-based solutions focused on helping you accelerate, automate, and optimize your operations.

We offer services in strategy and business management, development and implementation, as well as ongoing support and maintenance on Salesforce.com. Our founder has an experience of more than 10+ years, 300+ Projects, 12+ Appex change products, delivered more than 750k hours of implementation services with his team.

What we offer

Professional Services Custom Curated to Each Business!

Right solution in precise custom way that suits your business needs is our motto at Techabled Consulting.

  • Consulting

    Customer centric Salesforce Authorised Consulting partner.

  • Reseller

    We are an authorised reseller of Salesforce products and services.

  • Implementation

    Salesforce authorised product and services implementation partner.

Making Your Business "Techabled"

  • Be organized

    Organize processes and people

  • Identify your goals

    Set scalable goals

  • Gather information

    Gather valuable customer engagement information

  • Automate your process

    Gather valuable customer engagement information

  • Improve communication

    Increase communication among departments

  • Create a sales process

    Create a better sales process

  • Increase Sales

    Boot your sales

  • Improve Forecasts

    Increase sales forecasts and quotas
